mapper.select: SELECT * FROM rencaibiao r INNER JOIN rencaizibiao rz on r.rzbh=rz.rzbh INNER JOIN mianshiguizhanbiao m on m.zwbh=r.zwbh INNER JOIN mianshiguizhanzibiao mz on mz.mbh=m.mbh INNER JOIN mianshijilubiao mj on r.rid = mj.rid WHERE rz.rzname like "%" #{rzname} "%" and r.rzt=2 and mj.mjzt=3 and mz.mzbh=mj.mzbh
